citeinfo.pubdate: Unknown - per County-wide Microstation Maitenance files
citeinfo.title: eng.ENG.NCDOT_Rail

descript.abstract: Railroad track centerlines produced by NCDOT GIS Division. http://www.ncdot.org/it/gis/DataDistribution/default.html
descript.purpose: To represent railroad track centerlines with the State of North Carolina.
descript.supplinf:
The DOT GIS data is a collection of shapefiles generated from NCDOT County Map data and LRS data.
Please note that NCDOT is providing this data with no guarantee regarding the accuracy or completeness of the data. In fact, the LRS data and universe data are works in progress and some parts of the state are more complete than others.

sngdate.caldate: Unknown - Contact NCDOT for currentness information.

idinfo.useconst:
None. Please refer to NCDOT metadata for use appropriateness. http://www.ncdot.org/it/gis/DataDistribution/DOTData/metadata.html
The DOT GIS data is a collection of shapefiles generated from our County Map data and LRS data.
Please note that we are providing this data with no guarantee regarding the accuracy or completeness of the data. In fact, the LRS data and universe data are works in progress and some parts of the state are more complete than others.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows Vista Version 6.1 (Build 7600) ; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.1850

attracc.attraccr:
Unknown. Appears reasonable with regard to differentiation between main tracks and spurs. The main lines are generally Norfolk Southern in Buncombe County per the NS system map:
http://www.norfolksouthern.com/nscorphtml/pdf/system_map_2003.pdf

qattracc.attracce:
In the NCDOT County Maintenance CAD files (Microstation Design files), all rail linework is included as Level 44 (see explanation below
http://www.ncdot.org/it/gis/DataDistribution/CountyMapData/xsl_linework.html
The colors 24 & 31 within Level 44 correspond with Main Tracks and Spurs respectively. The ESRI shapefiles contain these color values as attributes as a result of the conversion process via NCDOT GIS Unit. These values were selected and converted to text for the "Track Type" field. All Level 44-24 linework was assumed to be under Norfolk Southern Operation, with the exclusion of a small length of track in north central Haywood County.

dataqual.complete: All linework available from NCDOT as a shapefile download was imported to the SDE Feature Class.

srcinfo.srcscale: Unknown - per DOT "These layers are for specific DOT use. There is no guarantee of accuracy, completeness, or fitness of use."

procstep.procdesc:
In the NCDOT County Maintenance CAD files (Microstation Design files), all rail linework is included as Level 44 (see explanation below
http://www.ncdot.org/it/gis/DataDistribution/CountyMapData/xsl_linework.html
The colors 24 & 31 within Level 44 correspond with Main Tracks and Spurs respectively. The ESRI shapefiles contain these color values as attributes as a result of the conversion process via NCDOT GIS Unit. These values were selected and converted to text for the "Track Type" field. All Level 44-24 linework was assumed to be under Norfolk Southern Operation, with the exclusion of a small length of track in north central Haywood County.
procstep.srcprod: Merged shapefiles for Buncombe, Haywood and Henderson County

altsys.altenc: Explicit elevation coordinate included with horizontal coordinates

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

edom.edomvd: Maintenance Spur or feeder line to facility.

attr.attrdef: Name of Operator for the Main Track or Spur

attrvai.attrvae: Interpreted from Norfolk Southern's System Map.
